text: Eric James Bransby (October 25, 1916 â€“ September 23, 2020) was an American artist and muralist. He studied and made murals in Colorado Springs, Colorado. He taught at Yale University, Brigham Young University, and University of Missouri-Kansas City. Bransby was born in Auburn, New York. He turned 100 in October 2016 and died in September 2020 at the age of 103.Colorado Springs arts legend, muralist Eric Bransby dies at 103 ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:Yale University faculty Category:Artists from New York (state) Category:Academics from Missouri Category:Academics from Utah
title: Eric Bransby
